channel.title: [PI] Webclient Loading Please wait [PI] It shows chatbar rep++
channel.description:
hey ppl
i made a webclient
and when i use it, it downloads cache and shows background, then i can log in and shows me chat area and inventory..
but the playing screen keeps black and says loading please wait ( could also be that it freezes)
how can this come ( happens to with my client now)
maybe its the map data ??? wrong in cache or such
plz tell me rep++
( to see what i mean go to www.nightmarexwebclient.webs.com/webclient.htm) [b]dont worry this is [u]NOT[/u] advertising, its a [u]test[/u] site with a[u] test [/u] webclient[/b]
[img]http://i22.servimg.com/u/f22/16/52/06/54/webcli10.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Webclient Loading Please wait [PI] It shows chatbar rep++
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

A ‘T1’ error is also known as a ‘Invalid Packet’ error. I think the packet in which you are sending (General Player Position Protocol Packet) is malformed which is then causing the client to throw an error. Mainly because the fact I had the same problem when I was developing my framework.

Here is the error in more detail, hope this helps you.

signlink.reporterror("Invalid Packet - Packet Id:" + packetId + ", Packet Size: " + packetSize + " - " + anInt842 + "," + anInt843);

So your packet 123 was invalid.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Webclient Loading Please wait [PI] It shows chatbar rep++
